actionDesc: This Action will upload a new photo, from a given URL to an image, to your 500px photostream.

This action will turn off the selected switch.

This action will turn your heat pump off.

This Action will set your Almond to the mode you choose.
This Action will activate the scene that you choose.
This Action will upload a file from a given URL and add it to Amazon Cloud Drive at the path you specify.
This Action will turn off your A/C in the specified room.

actionTitle: Run your A/C in comfort mode
actionDesc: This Action will turn on your A/C in the specified room, and run it in Comfort mode.

actionTitle: Run your A/C in away mode
actionDesc: This Action will turn on your A/C in the specified room, and run it in Away mode.
This Action will provide Comfort feedback for the device that you specified.

actionTitle: Run your A/C in temperature mode
actionDesc: This Action will turn on your A/C in the specified room, and run it in Temperature mode.
This Action will update the wallpaper on your Android device from the image URL you specify.
This Action will play a song you specify on your Android device. The music played depends on your device and setup.
This Action will play music on your Android device. The music played depends on your device and setup.
This Action will launch Google Maps Navigation on your Android device and begin turn-by-turn guidance to the destination you specify.

This action will mute your Android device's ringtone. If your device is already muted, it will remain muted. NOTE: If your device is in Do Not Disturb mode no action will be taken unless running Android 7.0.
This Action will set the ringtone volume of your Android device. NOTE: If your device is in Do Not Disturb mode no action will be taken unless running Android 7.0.
This Action will turn on your Android device's Bluetooth.
This Action will turn off your Android device's Bluetooth.
This Action will turn on your Android device's WiFi.
This Action will turn off your Android device's WiFi.
This Action will send an SMS from your Android device to any phone number you specify.
This Action will send a notification to your Android Wear devices.
This Action will set your Arlo mode to Armed.
This Action will set your Arlo mode to Disarmed.
This Action will start recording with the selected camera.

actionTitle: Send action to ARTIK Cloud Device
actionDesc: Send action to ARTIK Cloud Device.

This Action will send a command to a specific device.
This action will arm your Aura security system.
This action will disarm your Aura security system.
This Action will activate a BeoLink Gateway scene.
This Action will add a new datapoint to a Beeminder goal.
This Action will charge your credit card the specified amount. If you don't have a credit card on file with Beeminder, or if there's a problem trying to charge it, we'll email you to let you know.
This Action will set your camera ON.
This Action will set your camera OFF.
This Action will arm or disarm your Bhome.
This Action will turn on your wireless accessory that has on/off switch.
This Action will turn off your wireless accessory that has on/off switch.

actionTitle: Set a wireless accessory dimmer level
actionDesc: This Action will dim or brighten your wireless accessory with dimmer control.
This Action will send a notification to your mobile device. You can set your Bhome in Armed Away security mode from the notification.
This Action will shorten and add a new bitlink to your bitly account.
This Action will set your Blink system to Armed.
This Action will set your Blink system to Disarmed.
This Action will send your blink(1) a new event.
This Action will create a regular post on your Blogger blog.
This Action will create a photo post on your Blogger blog from the given URL to an image.
This action will change your Sense+ fan speed to the desired level.
This action will turn on/off your Sense+ automode. Please note that your Sense+ must be linked to a Blueair Aware air monitor in The Blueair Friend app for this action to work.
This action will increase your Sense+ fan speed to next level. If it's already running at top speed, it's turned off.
This Action will display a message on your car's front screen display within the BMW Labs Widget. Note: only the newest message will be shown with a maximum of 120 characters.
This Action will download a file at a given URL and add it to Box at the path you specify. NOTE: 30 MB file size limit.
This Action will create a new text file at the path you specify.

This Action will send a notification to your inbox.

actionTitle: Send a notification with an image

This Action will add a photo to Buffer. If your Buffer is full then the post will be skipped.
This Action will set the desired temperature for the specified thermostat.
This Action will set a new mode for all your Caleos.
This Action will toggle the LED status of a Caleo.

This Action stops recording on one or all of your cameras.

This Action turns off all motion notifications for all your cameras from your Camio App.

This Action will play the sound you selected on your siren.
This Action will turn on your Smart Plug.
This Action will turn off your Smart Plug.
This Action will toggle your Smart Plug on/off for 30 seconds.
This Action will turn on your Daikin AC unit, or change its settings. It will be executed within 1 minute.
This Action will turn off your Daikin AC unit. It will be executed within 1 minute.

This Action will enable/disable Econo mode on your Daikin AC unit. It will be executed within 1 minute and will only work in combination with the new R32 outdoor (RXM or MXM) units. If your unit does not support this function, then it will not show up in the device dropdown list.
This Action will enable/disable Holiday mode on all your Daikin AC units. It will be executed within 1 minute.
This Action will unlock the door.
This Action will lock the door.
This action will create a Signal based on the information you receive.
This Action will create a new Journal entry in the Journal you specify.
This Action will search for a track you specify and add the first matching result to your favorite tracks.
This Action will search for an album you specify and add the first matching result to your favorite albums.
This Action will search for an artist you specify and add the first matching result to your favorite artists.
This Action will search for a playlist you specify and add the first matching result to your favorite playlists.

This Action will search for a track you specify and add the first matching result to your playlist.

This Action will add a new private bookmark to your Delicious account.
This Action will add a public bookmark to your Diigo account.
This Action will add a private bookmark to your Diigo account.

actionTitle: Send "I'm OK" message to entire family
actionDesc: This Action will send an "I'm OK" message to the entire family through a notification.
This Action will download a file at a given URL and add it to Dropbox at the path you specify. NOTE: 30 MB file size limit.
This Action will create a new text file at the path you specify.
This Action will append to a text file as determined by the file name and folder path you specify. Once a file’s size reaches 2MB a new file will be created.
This Action will set the thermostat into an indefinite hold with the specified temperature.
This Action will set the thermostat into a hold with the specified temperature and the end date/time will be set to the next climate transition in the program.
This Action will set the thermostat into a hold with the specified temperature for the specified number of hours.
This Action will create a vacation event on the selected thermostat with the specified setpoint. The vacation event will begin immediately and last the number of specified days.

actionTitle: Set comfort profile until next transition
actionDesc: This Action will set the thermostat into a hold using the settings from the specified comfort profile. This comfort profile hold will remain in effect until the next next comfort profile transition in the program.

actionTitle: Set comfort profile for X hours
actionDesc: This Action will set the thermostat into a hold using the settings from the specified comfort profile. This comfort profile hold will remain in effect for the specified number of hours.
This Action removes the currently running event on the selected thermostat providing the event is not a mandatory demand response event.

actionTitle: Water my garden for ___ min. starting in 30 min.
actionDesc: This action will schedule a watering in your garden 30 min. from when the trigger fires

actionTitle: Water my garden tomorrow morning at ___ for ___ min.
actionDesc: This action will schedule a watering in your garden starting in the AM the following day

actionTitle: Water my garden at a certain time and for ___ min.
actionDesc: This action will schedule a watering in your garden for chosen start time and duration
This Action will turn on bed warming for the side of the bed you choose.
This Action will turn off warming for the side of the bed you choose.
This Action will send you an HTML based email. Images and links are supported.
This Action will add an item to your daily digest sent once a day at the time you specify.
This Action will add an item to your weekly digest sent once a week on the day and time you specify.
This Action will turn your light on.
This Action will turn your lights off.
This Action will toggle the state of the light. If the light is ON, this Action will turn it OFF. If the light is OFF, this Action will turn it ON.
This Action will change the dimness of your light to a specific level.
This Action will turn on a group of your Emberlights.
This Action will turn off a group of your Emberlights.
This Action will dim a group of Emberlights.
This Action will toggle a group of Emberlights. For example, if your group of lights is on, it will turn them off. And if your group of lights is off, it will turn them on.
This action will power off a Mi|Home device, identified by its name.
This Action will turn on one of your Mi|Home devices.
This action will power on a Mi|Home device, identified by its name.

actionDesc: This Action will turn off one of your Mi|Home devices.

This Action will turn on a whole group of Mi|Home devices simultaneously.

This Action will display a message on your EVE for Tesla dashboard. Receive messages, notifications of emails and calendar events, sports scores and more in your Tesla. Premium EVE for Tesla account required.
This Action will create a new note in the notebook you specify.
This Action will append to a note as determined by its title and notebook. Once a note’s size reaches 2MB a new note will be created.
This Action will append a to-do checkbox to a note as determined by its title and notebook. Once a note’s size reaches 2MB a new note will be created.
This Action will create a new link note from a source URL in the notebook you specify.
This Action will create a new note with an image attachment in the notebook you specify.

This Action will turn the Sleep Mode ON or OFF. When Sleep mode is on, the camera stops monitoring for your privacy. Supported models: Mini and Mini O
This Action will turn the alarm notification ON or OFF. When the notification is turned on, EZVIZ will push alarm notifications to your mobile device. Supported models: all
This Action will turn Privacy Mode ON or OFF. When Privacy mode is ON, the camera stops monitoring by rolling the lens under a cover for your privacy. Supported model: Mini 360

This Action will create a new link post on Facebook.

This action will close the garage door.

This Action will open the garage door you specify. If the garage door is already open, the door will remain open.

actionDesc: This Action will open the garage door you specify. If the garage door is already opened, the door will remain opened. This Action will only work with "garage mode". Remote access must be enabled.
This Action will close the garage door you specify. If the garage door is already closed, the door will remain closed. This Action will only work with "garage mode". Remote access must be enabled.

actionDesc: This Action will turn off irrigation and lightning in all areas.

actionTitle: Turn a device on or off

actionDesc: Toggles a device to off if it is on, or toggles it to on if it is off.

This Action will turn your Hive light off.

actionTitle: Turn on oven with top/bottom heat
actionDesc: This Action will start the oven in top/bottom heat program at your preferred temperature and duration.

actionTitle: Turn on oven with hot air
actionDesc: This Action will start the oven in hot air program at your preferred temperature and duration.

actionTitle: Turn on oven with pizza function
actionDesc: This Action will start the oven in pizza function at your preferred temperature and duration.
This Action will stop the running washer program.

This Action will start the Delicates/Silk program with your preferred settings.
This Action will start the Wool program with your preferred settings.
This Action will create and record an event. Home8 takes a snapshot and records 30 seconds from all connected cameras. Users may review and share these snapshots and recordings.
This Action will arm a Home8 system. If already armed, it will remain armed.
This Action will disarm a Home8 system. If already disarmed, it will remain disarmed.
This Action will turn a Home8 switch on. If already on, it will remain on.
This Action will turn a Home8 switch off. If already off, it will remain off.

This Action will enable the viewing of a Home8 camera. If already enabled, it will remain on.
This Action will disable the viewing of a Home8 camera. If already disabled, it will remain off.
This Action will open or close a Home8 controlled garage door.
This Action will arm the Homeboy location you specify. NOTE: if the Homeboy location is already armed it will remain armed.
This Action will disarm the Homeboy location you specify. NOTE: if the Homeboy location is already disarmed it will remain disarmed.
This Action will arm the Homeboy camera you specify. NOTE: if the Homeboy camera is already armed it will remain armed.
This Action will disarm the Homeboy camera you specify. NOTE: if the Homeboy camera is already disarmed it will remain disarmed.
This Action will tell the Homeboy camera you specify to record a video ASAP.
This Action will create a new entry on the Homeboy location timeline you specify and notify the Homeboy crew.
This Action will arm the security panel.
This Action will Disarm your security panel.
This Action will run a HomeSeer system event. HomeSeer events can be programmed to control just about any combination of home automation products installed in your home!
This Action will turn on a device attached to your HomeSeer system. Devices may include light switches, receptacles, plug-in modules and much more!
This Action will turn off a device attached to your HomeSeer system. Devices may include light switches, receptacles, plug-in modules and much more!
This Action will dim a dimmable lighting device attached to your HomeSeer system.
This Action will lock a door lock attached to your HomeSeer system.
This Action will unlock a door lock attached to your HomeSeer system.
This Action will change the cool set-point of a thermostat attached to your HomeSeer system.
This Action will change the heat set-point of a thermostat attached to your HomeSeer system.

actionTitle: Change a thermostat's operating mode to auto
actionDesc: This Action will change the the operating mode of a thermostat attached to your HomeSeer system to auto.

actionTitle: Change a thermostat's operating mode to off
actionDesc: This Action will change the the operating mode of a thermostat attached to your HomeSeer system to off.

actionTitle: Change a thermostat's operating mode to cool
actionDesc: This Action will change the the operating mode of a thermostat attached to your HomeSeer system to cool.

actionTitle: Change a thermostat's operating mode to heat

actionDesc: This action will send a text command to your HomeSeer system.

This Action will let Homey speak.
This Action will turn the hot water at one of your locations on. This can either be permanent or for a number of hours.
This Action will turn the hot water at one of your locations off. This can either be permanent or for a number of hours.
This Action will enable a quick action at one of your locations. This can either be permanent or for a number of days/hours.
This Action will remove any existing quick action at your location and set your heating system to follow the schedule.
This Action sets an override on target temperature of one of your zones. This can either be permanently set or just for a number of hours.

actionTitle: Set temperature to a permanent hold
actionDesc: This Action will set your Honeywell thermostat to permanently hold the specified temperature until you change it.

actionTitle: Set fan to on, auto or circulate
actionDesc: This Action will set the Honeywell thermostat fan to On where the fan is always on or Auto where the fan runs only when the heating or cooling system is on.
This action will enable a quick action at one of your locations. This can either be permanent or for a number of days/hours.
This action will remove any existing quick action at your location and set your heating system to follow the schedule.
This action sets an override on target temperature of one of your zones. This can either be permanently set or just for a number of hours.

actionTitle: Set temperature to a permanent hold
actionDesc: This Action will set your Honeywell thermostat to permanently hold the specified temperature until you change it.

actionTitle: Set temperature for a period of time
actionDesc: This Action will set your Honeywell thermostat to hold a temperature for a specified period of time. The schedule will resume when the time expires.
This Action will set your Honeywell thermostat to resume the currently defined thermostat programmed schedule.

actionTitle: Set fan to on or auto
actionDesc: This Action will set the Honeywell thermostat fan to On where the fan is always on or Auto where the fan runs only when the heating or cooling system is on.
This Action will allow you to send to your HP ePrint printer a photo url in the following formats: jpg, jpeg, bmp, png, gif, tiff.

This Action will allow you to send to your HP printer any url of text (.txt), document (.doc and .docx), presentation (.ppt and .pptx), spreadsheet (.xls and .xlsx), PDF (.pdf) and HTML (.html).

This Action will change the A/C system to the selected mode.
This Action will set the A/C sleep timer to a predetermined period.
This Action will change the A/C system to the selected fan speed.
This Action will upload a photo at a given URL and add it to your Eyefi Cloud.
This Action will add a to-do for Today. A reminder will go off if you also specify a time. Optionally, you can specify a location.
This Action will add a to-do for Someday. Optionally, you can specify a location. Use this Action if you don't know when you will work on this to-do yet.

actionTitle: Add an event to your calendar
actionDesc: This Action will add an event, sync'ed to any calendar (#Apple/#iCloud, #Google, #Outlook/#Office 365, #Yahoo and more). Optionally, you can specify a location.
This Action will display notification on your LaMetric Time.
This Action will update the indicator on your LaMetric Time.
This Action will change the light color of your Smart Alert.
This Action will turn the light on your Leeo Smart Alert on. It will not affect your Smart Alert's ability to detect alarms or sense temperature or humidity.
This Action will turn the light on your Leeo Smart Alert off. It will not affect your Smart Alert's ability to detect alarms or sense temperature or humidity.
This Action will turn the light on your Leeo Smart Alert on if it's off, or off if it's on. It will not affect your Smart Alert's ability to detect alarms or sense temperature or humidity.
This Action turns your Wi-Fi on or off based on the state specified.
This Action turns Bluetooth on or off based on the state specified.
This Action turns NFC on or off based on the state specified.
This Action will create a new memo in Qmemo+.
This Action will save a new photo to your IFTTT album.
This Action will save a new video to your IFTTT album.
This Action will send a new message to a circle you specify.
This action will make a web request to a publicly accessible URL. NOTE: Requests may be rate limited.

This Action will start your Manything camera. NOTE: The camera needs to be open at the recording screen on the device you specify and in standby mode. Your camera will start in the recording mode selected in its settings.
This Action will stop your Manything camera from recording.

actionTitle: Turn on sound and motion push notifications
actionDesc: This Action will turn on sound and motion push notifications from your Manything camera.

actionTitle: Turn off sound and motion push notifications
actionDesc: This Action will turn off sound and motion push notifications from your Manything camera.

actionTitle: Turn on sound and motion emails
actionDesc: This Action will turn on sound and motion email alerts from your Manything camera.

actionTitle: Turn off sound and motion emails
actionDesc: This Action will turn off sound and motion email alerts from your Manything camera.
This Action will change the Manything settings so that video is captured using the front facing camera.
This Action will change the Manything settings so that video is captured using the rear facing camera.
This Action will turn the camera's flashlight on (if it has one). NOTE: Works on iOS only, not yet available for Android
This Action will turn the camera's flashlight off. NOTE: Works on iOS only, not yet available for Android
This Action will mute audio for recordings made on a device, so no audio is captured.
This Action will turn off mute audio, so that sound is captured when the device is recording.
This Action will switch your recording from a video stream to stills only mode, where still images are taken at regular intervals rather than video. Ideal for low bandwidth usage.
This Action will switch from ”Stills Only Mode” to a video stream.
This Action will sets the time interval between stills images. This value is only used when the phone is recording in stills mode.
This Action will set the motion sensitivity on a device. "1" triggers on small motion events. "10" triggers on big motion events.
This Action will set a number of different camera settings at the same time. NOTE: To start a new recording, the app must be open at the recording screen on the device you specify.
This Action will create a new post on your Medium profile.
This Action will create a new task in the section you specify.
This Action will turn your air conditioning off.
This Action will start cooling the room until desired temperature is reached.
This Action will start heating the room until desired temperature is reached.
This Action will start your A/C's fan.
This action will print a message from a Memobird device.

actionTitle: Send an event to MESH app
actionDesc: This Action will send an event to MESH app.
This Action will send an SMS to the phone number you specify.
This Action will send a voice message to the phone number you specified.
This Action will send a chat message to the contact you specified.
This Action will turn on/off your microBees switches.
This Action will run a specific microBees Scenario.
This Action will play/pause scenario.
This Action will change your scenarios settings. For example you can change your economy desired temperature in your Thermostat Scenario.
This Action will push MicroBot and stay pushed until you pull it back.
This Action will press MicroBot. It will stay pushed and become pulled back after the duration specified.
This Action will pull MicroBot. Nothing happens if it has been pulled already.
This Action will toggle MicroBot, that is, it will be pulled if it's already pushed and vice versa.
This action will set the specified thermostat to summer mode.
This action will set the specified thermostat to winter mode.

actionTitle: Log a photo of your meal
actionDesc: This Action will log a new photo of your meal to Misfit.

This Action will recall and start playback of an internet radio preset stored in a Musaic player. If the player is in Networked Standby it will wake up. The volume will be the last volume used unless specified.
This Action will replace the Musaic players queue with the audio from the given URL and start playback. The URL can be for a local music server or internet radio stream.

This Action will recall a home control scene that you have set up on your Musaic player. Setting a scene to "on" recalls that scene, setting a scene to "off" turns off all devices that are included in that scene.
This Action will play an alarm sound to the room (i.e. Musaic player) you select.
This Action will convert your message to speech and play it to a room (i.e. Musaic player) in the voice/language you choose.
This Action will set a specific volume (0-100) for the room (i.e. Musaic player) that you select.
This Action will mute the selected room (i.e. Musaic player).
This Action will un-mute the selected room (i.e. Musaic player).
This Action will turn off the selected room (i.e. put the selected Musaic player into Networked Standby).
This Action will search for a track you specify and add the first matching result to your favorites on Musixmatch.
This Action will arm your Myfox security system.
This Action will partially arm your Myfox security system.
This Action will disable your Myfox security system.
This Action will play the selected scenario from your Myfox security system.

This Action will turn OFF one of your myStrom devices.
This Action will TOGGLE one of your myStrom devices.
This Action will change the color of myStrom WiFi Bulb.
This Action will execute predefined Scene.

actionTitle: Notify you using your Nanoleaf Aurora
actionDesc: This action will temporarily set your Nanoleaf Aurora to a solid or blinking color and then return to its previous state. Requires Aurora version 1.4.39 or higher.
This action will turn on the Nanoleaf product that you select from the device dropdown on this screen.
This action will turn off the Nanoleaf product that you select from the device dropdown on this screen.
This action will brighten the Nanoleaf product that you select from the device dropdown on this screen, using the percentage that you specify.
This action will dim the Nanoleaf product that you select from the device dropdown on this screen, using the percentage that you select.

actionTitle: Set brightness of Nanoleaf smart light
actionDesc: This action will set the brightness of the Nanoleaf product that you select from the device dropdown on this screen, using the percentage that you specify.

This action will change the color of the Nanoleaf Aurora that you select from the device dropdown on this screen. You can enter either a hex value or a keyword for the color. Need help choosing a color? Bookmark nanoleaf.me/ifttt for easy access to a list and color picker.
This action will activate the Scene that you choose. You can choose from any Scene that is listed in your Nanoleaf Smarter Series App.
This Action will read a new article, from the given URL, into your Narro feed.
This Action will read a plain-text submission into your Narro feed. This is currently available only to Narro Pro members.
This Action will set the current room temperature to a level of your choice. This temperature level can be adjusted manually or if Clock Mode is activated.
This Action will set your room temperature to a new set point for a configurable period.
This Action will set a Nest Thermostat to the temperature you specify. NOTE: works only when Nest is set to Home.
This Action will set a Nest Thermostat in Heat-Cool mode to the temperature range you specify. NOTE: works only when Nest is set to Home.

This Action will turn on your HVAC system fan for the amount of time you specify in your Nest fan timer setting (default is 15 minutes). NOTE: works only if you have a fan option and Nest is set to Home.

This Action will tell Netatmo Welcome everybody has left the house.

This Action will set the temperature to the selected level in THERMIC.
This Action will set the THERMIC to the selected mode.
This Action will publish a new blog post to your site.
This Action will set the mode of your air purifier to a level you specify (off, low, medium, high, auto).
This Action will start a brew cycle with your coffeemaker.
This Action will adjust your humidifier to your specified fan mode (Max, High, Medium, Low, Min, Off).
This Action will set your humidifier’s humidity target level to the percentage you specify. (45%, 50%, 55%, 60%, Max%).
This Action will turn a WeMo Insight Switch on. If the WeMo Insight Switch is already on, it will remain on.
This Action will turn a WeMo Switch off. If the WeMo Switch is already off, it will remain off.
This Action will turn a WeMo Insight Switch on then immediately back off.
This Action will turn a WeMo Switch off then immediately back on.
This Action will toggle a WeMo Insight Switch on or off.
This Action will turn a WeMo Light Switch on. If the WeMo Switch is already on, it will remain on.
This Action will turn a WeMo Light Switch off. If the WeMo Switch is already off, it will remain off.
This Action will turn a WeMo Light Switch on then immediately back off.
This Action will turn a WeMo Light Switch off then immediately back on.
This Action will toggle a WeMo Light Switch on or off.
Turns on the selected WeMo light. If it is already on it stays on.
Turns off the selected WeMo light. If it is already off it stays off.
Changes the brightness level of the selected WeMo light. If the light is off it will turn on with selected brightness level.

actionTitle: Turn on a group of lights
actionDesc: Turns on the selected group of WeMo lights. If the group is already on it will remain on.

actionTitle: Turn off a group of lights
actionDesc: Turns off the selected group of WeMo lights. If the group is already off it will remain off.
Changes the brightness level of the selected group of WeMo lights. If the group is off it will turn on with selected brightness level.
Starts sleep fader for the selected WeMo light.

actionTitle: Set sleep fader for a group of lights
actionDesc: Sets sleep fader time for the selected group of WeMo lights.
This Action will turn your WeMo Maker on. If the WeMo Maker is already on, it will remain on.
This Action will turn a WeMo Maker off. If the WeMo Maker is already off, it will remain off.
This Action will toggle a Wemo Maker if it is in toggle mode. If the relay is on, it will be turned off and vice versa.
This Action will turn a Wemo Maker off then on. If the WeMo Maker is already off, it will remain off.
This Action will turn a WeMo Maker on then off. If the WeMo Maker is already on, it will be turned off after 2 seconds.
This Action will turn a WeMo Maker on for 300 milliseconds. Note: WeMo Maker must be in 'Momentary' mode for this action to work.

actionTitle: Turn relay on momentarily multiple times
actionDesc: This Action will turn a WeMo Maker on for 300 milliseconds as many times as you set. Note: The WeMo Maker must be in 'Momentary' mode for this Action to work.

actionTitle: Turn relay on then off multiple times
actionDesc: This Action will turn relay on then off as many times as you set. Note: The WeMo Maker must be in 'Toggle' mode for this Action to work.

actionTitle: Turn relay off then on multiple times
actionDesc: This Action will turn relay off then on as many times as you set. Note: The WeMo Maker must be in 'Toggle' mode for this Action to work.
This Action will adjust your Slow Cooker to your specified cooking mode (High, Low, Keep Warm, Off).
This Action will adjust your Slow Cooker to your specified cooking mode (High, Low, Keep Warm, Off) for a selected time period.
This Action will turn a WeMo Switch on. If the WeMo Switch is already on, it will remain on.
This Action will turn a WeMo Switch off. If the WeMo Switch is already off, it will remain off.
This Action will turn a WeMo Switch on then immediately back off.
This Action will turn a WeMo Switch off then immediately back on.
This Action will toggle a WeMo Switch on or off.
This Action will write a new message in a given sphere.
This action will launch the next scheduled cycle on your dryer.
This Action will place your refrigerator in Vacation Mode. In Vacation Mode, the freezer will defrost less often to conserve energy.
This action will launch the next scheduled cycle on your washer.
This Action will post a note to your dog's timeline on your behalf.
This Action will post a photo to your dog's timeline on your behalf.
This Action will turn a WIFIPLUG on. If the WIFIPLUG is already on, it will remain on.
This Action will turn a WIFIPLUG off. If the WIFIPLUG is already off, it will remain off.
This Action will flicker a WIFIPLUG. i.e. turn off and back on (if on) or turn on and back off (if off).
This Action will turn your Aros A/C on and set to a temperature you specify.
This Action will turn your Aros A/C off.
This Action will set a new label on your Nimbus device.
This Action will turn on the Pivot Power Genius outlet you specify. If the outlet is already on, it will remain on.
This Action will turn off the Pivot Power Genius outlet you specify. If the outlet is already off, it will remain off.
This Action will toggle the Pivot Power Genius outlet you specific on or off.
This Action will activate the shortcut you specify.
This Action will beep the tag. NOTE: Only compatible with the Motion Sensor Tags with buzzer.
This Action will stop the tag beeping. This action can also be used to test tag connectivity.
This Action will turn on LED on the tag or a WeMo device.
This Action will turn off LED on the tag or a WeMo device.
This Action arms motion sensor on a tag. Regular angle based motion sensor, Reed KumoSensor and PIR KumoSensor can all be armed using this action.
This Action disarms motion sensor on a tag. Regular angle based motion sensor, Reed KumoSensor and PIR KumoSensor can all be disarmed using this action.
This Action will enable temperature monitoring on a tag.
This Action will disable temperature monitoring on a tag.
This Action will enable humidity or moisture monitoring on a tag. NOTE: Only compatible with Tags with humidity or moisture sensor.
This Action will disable humidity or moisture monitoring on a tag.

This Action will start a KumoApp installed under the current user account. If the KumoApp is running, nothing will happen. If a KumoApp does not register any event handler or timer, it will automatically stop after executing the first time, allowing this action to run multiple times without user intervention.
This Action will stop a KumoApp. If the KumoApp is not running, nothing will happen.
This Action will enable brightness/ambient light intensity monitoring on a tag. NOTE: Only compatible with Tags with ambient light sensor.
This Action will disable brightness/ambient light intensity monitoring on a tag.
This Action will set your Wiser Air Thermostat to Home, Away or Sleep mode. Eco IQ is disabled by running this Action.
This Action will set your Wiser Air Thermostat to the temperature you specify. Eco IQ is disabled by running this Action.
This Action will set your Wiser Air Thermostat to Off, Heat, Cool, or Auto mode. Eco IQ is disabled by running this Action.
This Action will change your Withings Home camera mode. To get more information about camera modes, you can go to your app Control Center.
This action will turn on the selected light(s). Optionally, a light mode or pre-defined color can be applied, as well as a level of dimming.
This action will turn off the selected light(s).
This action will make the selected light(s) pulse gently once.

actionTitle: Add an entry to a databin
actionDesc: This Action will add an entry to the specified databin.
This action will call your phone number to play customizable text. Call rates at https://woop.la/ifttt
This action will call your phone number to play an MP3 audio file. Call rates at https://woop.la/ifttt

actionTitle: Call a phone number and play text
actionDesc: This action will call a phone number to play customizable text. Call rates at https://woop.la/ifttt

actionTitle: Call a phone number and play audio
actionDesc: This action will call a phone number to play an MP3 audio file. Call rates at https://woop.la/ifttt
This Action will create a normal post on your WordPress blog.
This Action will create a photo post on your WordPress blog from the given URL to an image.
This Actions beeps your finder.
This Action will turn on, turn off or toggle your lights.
This Action will set your lights to a specified brightness.
This Action will change your lights to a specified color.
This Action will change your lights to specified color temperature.
This Action will set your lights to a pre-defined scene.
This action will change your light's brightness to the specified level.
This action will send a Yo to the username you provide
This action will turn on a Z-Wave switch you specify.
This action will turn off a Z-Wave switch you specify.
This action will unlock a Z-Wave door you specify.
This action will close a Z-Wave door you specify.
This action will set a Z-Wave dimmer to a level you specify.
This action will set a Z-Wave thermostat you specify to off.

actionTitle: Set a thermostat to heating mode
actionDesc: This action will set a Z-Wave thermostat you specify to heating mode.

actionTitle: Set a thermostat to cooling mode
actionDesc: This action will set a Z-Wave thermostat you specify to cooling mode.

actionTitle: Set a thermostat to auto mode
actionDesc: This action will set a Z-Wave thermostat you specify to auto mode.
